data.lyric:
[ti:Somebody’s Problem]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:Somebody’s Problem]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Somebody’s Problem - Morgan Wallen
[00:02.25]Lyrics by：Morgan Wallen/Jacob Durrett/Rodney Clawson/Ernest Keith Smith
[00:04.51]Composed by：Morgan Wallen/Jacob Durrett/Rodney Clawson/Ernest Keith Smith
[00:06.77]A 'Bama red 4Runner pulled into the party
[00:10.15]With a 30-A sticker on the back windshield
[00:13.93]Two-tone tank top slippin' off her shoulder
[00:17.24]Kinda girl when she steps out the world stands still
[00:21.23]Ooh I know where this is goin'
[00:24.61]I already know it
[00:26.86]She's somebody's problem somebody's goodbye
[00:30.66]Somebody's last call number that they can't find
[00:34.42]Somebody's best day somebody's worst night
[00:37.74]Somebody's reason for leavin' on the porch light
[00:41.29]Thinkin' 'bout them tan lines and I'm thinkin' d**n I'd
[00:44.97]Love to drown in them heartbreaker blue eyes
[00:48.11]She's somebody's problem and somebody's problem's
[00:51.68]About to be mine
[00:55.14]About to be mine
[00:59.09]Kinda girl once you've had her you can't stand to lose her
[01:02.85]Kinda girl where your friends tell you don't F it up
[01:06.19]Kinda girl that goes from tryin' to just to get her number
[01:09.78]To slidin' through the summer to talkin' 'bout love
[01:13.66]Ooh I think I'm likin' where it's goin'
[01:16.95]I'd like to try me some of
[01:19.81]Somebody's problem somebody's goodbye
[01:23.14]Somebody's last call number that they can't find
[01:26.90]Somebody's best day somebody's worst night
[01:30.20]Somebody's reason for leavin' on the porch light
[01:33.76]Thinkin' 'bout them tan lines and I'm thinkin' d**n I'd
[01:37.38]Love to drown in them heartbreaker blue eyes
[01:40.68]She's somebody's problem and somebody's problem's
[01:44.14]About to be mine
[01:47.58]About to be mine
[01:52.21]Oh hey baby don't just keep me wishin'
[01:55.48]Oh let me get to fixin'
[01:58.39]Somebody's problem somebody's goodbye
[02:01.73]Somebody's last call number that they can't find
[02:05.44]Somebody's best day somebody's worst night
[02:08.74]Somebody's reason for leavin' on the porch light
[02:12.29]Thinkin' 'bout them tan lines and I'm thinkin' d**n I'd
[02:16.00]Love to drown in them heartbreaker blue eyes
[02:19.21]She's somebody's problem and somebody's problem's
[02:22.68]About to be mine
[02:26.19]About to be mine
[02:29.73]About to be mine
[02:33.26]About to be mine
data.trans:
[ti:Somebody’s Problem]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:Somebody’s Problem]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.25]//
[00:04.51]//
[00:06.77]一辆红色四驱车来到派对现场
[00:10.15]后挡风玻璃上贴着“30-A”的贴纸
[00:13.93]双色背心的肩带挂在她的肩上
[00:17.24]这种姑娘出现时 全世界都静止了
[00:21.23]我知道这会变成什么样
[00:24.61]我已经知道了
[00:26.86]她会让别人烦恼 让别人与她告别
[00:30.66]她是别人到最后才会想起联系的人
[00:34.42]她让别人快乐一整天 也让别人难受一整夜
[00:37.74]她让别人为她留着一盏灯 翘首盼着她回来
[00:41.29]想起她身上的晒痕 我好渴望
[00:44.97]沉醉在她让人心碎的蓝色眼眸里
[00:48.11]她会让别人烦恼 而那个烦恼的人
[00:51.68]可能就是我
[00:55.14]可能就是我
[00:59.09]这种姑娘 一旦你拥有了 就不愿再失去她
[01:02.85]这种姑娘 你的朋友都会叫你好好珍惜
[01:06.19]这种姑娘 你会想法设法得到她的电话号码
[01:09.78]相伴整个夏天 谈情说爱
[01:13.66]我觉得我喜欢这样的故事
[01:16.95]我很想感受她的爱
[01:19.81]让别人烦恼 让别人与她告别
[01:23.14]她是别人到最后才会想起联系的人
[01:26.90]她让别人快乐一整天 也让别人难受一整夜
[01:30.20]她让别人为她留着一盏灯 翘首盼着她回来
[01:33.76]想起她身上的晒痕 我好渴望
[01:37.38]沉醉在她让人心碎的蓝色眼眸里
[01:40.68]她会让别人烦恼 而那个烦恼的人
[01:44.14]可能就是我
[01:47.58]可能就是我
[01:52.21]嘿 宝贝 不要吊我胃口
[01:55.48]让我和你靠近
[01:58.39]让别人烦恼 让别人与她告别
[02:01.73]她是别人到最后才会想起联系的人
[02:05.44]她让别人快乐一整天 也让别人难受一整夜
[02:08.74]她让别人为她留着一盏灯 翘首盼着她回来
[02:12.29]想起她身上的晒痕 我好渴望
[02:16.00]沉醉在她让人心碎的蓝色眼眸里
[02:19.21]她会让别人烦恼 而那个烦恼的人
[02:22.68]可能就是我
[02:26.19]可能就是我
[02:29.73]可能就是我
[02:33.26]可能就是我
